LightningComponentBundle.description: A configurable related list component that supports Files, Internal Asset Requests, Knowledge Articles, and any Salesforce object

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID
property.description: The parent record ID. Use {!recordId} to dynamically use the current record ID.

property.name: selectedObject
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: API name of the object to display. Examples: 'Files', 'Account', 'Case', 'Internal_Asset_Request__c', 'Knowledge__kav'

property.name: relatedListLabel
property.label: Related List Label
property.description: Display name for this related list. Leave blank for auto-generated labels based on object type.

property.name: fieldSetName
property.label: Field Set API Name
property.description: For non-Files objects: Field set defining columns to display. Leave blank for smart defaults. Files objects ignore this setting.

property.name: recordLimit
property.label: Record Limit
property.description: Number of records to display before showing 'View All'. Use 0 for smart defaults (Files: 8, Others: 6).

property.name: disableFileUpload
property.label: Disable File Upload
property.description: Check this box to disable file upload functionality for Files objects. Upload is enabled by default.

property.name: maxFileSize
property.label: Max File Size (MB)
property.description: Maximum file size in megabytes for uploads. Only applies to Files objects.

property.name: acceptedFileTypes
property.label: Accepted File Types
property.description: Comma-separated file extensions (e.g., '.pdf,.doc,.jpg') or leave blank for all types. Only applies to Files objects.
